column4: anyone care to help me real quick.. fresh install of ubuntu 6.06.1 on my slow laptop.. can't get gnome to come up..
every reboot brings me to console.. i login and such.. but i was hoping for gnome
how do i boot up gnome from command console?
probably with a command like start-gnome I think
i can't even access the file system.. it's command console..   says:                oem@portege:~#
yeah.. i actually got root on there :)
i unlocked the root account.. i'm logged into it now
